  • Method Details

    • registerTeam

      public String registerTeam(String name, String country, String coachName)
      Registers a new team by prompting the user for team details such as name, country, and coach name.
      Pre: None
      Post: A new team has been registered.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the team
      country - the country of the team
      coachName - the coach name of the team
      Returns:
      a message indicating whether the team was added or not

    • addPerson

      public String addPerson(String id, String name, String country, int dorsal, int position, String teamName)
      Registers a new player by specifying its ID, name, country, dorsal number, position, and team name.
      Pre: The team must exist.
      Post: The player has been registered and added to the team.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the player.
      name - The name of the player.
      country - The country of the player.
      dorsal - The dorsal number of the player.
      position - The position of the player.
      teamName - The name of the team that the player belongs to.
      Returns:
      A message indicating whether the player was registered successfully.

    • addPerson

      public String addPerson(String id, String name, String country, int refereeType)

    • searchPerson

      public Person searchPerson(String id)

    • searchTeam

      public Team searchTeam(String teamName)
      Busca un equipo por su nombre.
      Pre: El torneo debe estar inicializado.
      Post: El equipo ha sido encontrado.
      Parameters:
      teamName - El nombre del equipo a buscar.
      Returns:
      El equipo si existe, null en caso contrario.

    • initializeTournament

      public String initializeTournament()
      Initializes the tournament by pre-loading data for teams, players, and referees.
      Pre: The arrays for teams must be initialized. Players should be pre-defined in each team. The maximum number of referees is 12.
      Post: Each team is initialized with a coach and players, and referees are assigned. Random names and countries are generated for coaches, players, and referees.
      Returns:
      A message indicating that the tournament has been initialized.

    • generateGroupStageFixture

      public String generateGroupStageFixture(String[] group1Dates, String[] group1Hours, String[] group2Dates, String[] group2Hours, String lastDate, String lastHour)
      Generates the group stage fixture by creating matches between teams.
      Pre: The tournament must be initialized.
      Post: The group stage fixture has been generated.
      Parameters:
      group1Dates - The dates of the first group.
      group1Hours - The hours of the first group.
      group2Dates - The dates of the second group.
      group2Hours - The hours of the second group.
      lastDate - The date of the last match.
      lastHour - The hour of the last match.
      Returns:
      A message indicating whether the group stage fixture was generated successfully.

    • assignRefereesToMatch

      public String assignRefereesToMatch(String[] refereeIds, String localName, String visitorName)
      Assigns referees to a match.
      Pre: The tournament must be initialized.
      Post: The referees have been assigned to the match.
      Parameters:
      refereeIds - The ids of the referees.
      localName - The name of the local team.
      visitorName - The name of the visitor team.
      Returns:
      A message indicating whether the referees were assigned successfully.

    • registerResult

      public String registerResult(String localName, String visitorName, String[] scorersIds, int[] scorersMinutes, String[] assistantIds, boolean[] ownGoals, int[] yellowCards, int[] redCards)
      Registers the result of a match by specifying the local and visitor teams, goals, own goals, yellow cards, and red cards.
      Pre: The match must exist.
      Post: The result of the match has been registered.
      Parameters:
      localName - The name of the local team.
      visitorName - The name of the visitor team.
      scorersIds - The IDs of the goal scorers.
      scorersMinutes - The minutes of the goals.
      assistantIds - The IDs of the goal assistants.
      ownGoals - Whether the goals were own goals or not.
      yellowCards - The number of yellow cards of each team.
      redCards - The number of red cards of each team.
      Returns:
      A message indicating whether the result was registered successfully.

    • searchMatch

      public Match searchMatch(Team local, Team visitor)
      Searches for a match in the tournament given the local and visitor teams.
      Pre: The tournament must be initialized.
      Post: The match has been found.
      Parameters:
      local - The local team of the match to search.
      visitor - The visitor team of the match to search.
      Returns:
      The match if found, null otherwise.
